snippet: Three North Korean diplomats disrupted the United Nations panel on North Korean rights abuses to deliver a statement denying any wrongdoing in their country.
lead_paragraph: Three North Korean diplomats disrupted the United Nations panel on North Korean rights abuses to deliver a statement denying any wrongdoing in their country.

headline.main: North Korean Diplomats Disrupt Human Rights Panel
